General.Name: WinWay Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, processes, and sells optoelectronic product test fixtures, integrated circuit test interfaces, and fixtures and their components in Taiwan, the United States, China, Europe, Canada, and Asia. Its products include test sockets, CMOS/RF/memory module test sockets, active thermal controllers, burn-in sockets, vertical probe cards, E Flux & HEATCon ultra products, and brownie coaxial sockets, as well as contact elements, such as probe/PCR/ i-Bump. The company also provides substrate and load board designing, and spring probe designing and manufacturing services. In addition, it engages in the provision of professional and technical support services; and import and export trade of related products. The company serves semiconductor, optical, information technology, and optoelectronics industries. WinWay Technology Co., Ltd. designs was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 68, Chuangyi South Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 811
